name: Frail Divinity
description:
*Supports touch devices*

You've been entrusted to take over Earth for a while. Can you please the almighty?

Play a visual novel styled game with choices, where the God (or, the developer of the game) acts a mediator between you and the people. Help out the people, and please the God.

Remember, your actions have consequences!

Changelog (Current version is v1.1.2):
  • v1.0: Base Release [Limited to a number of people]
  • v1.0.1: Added touch support, bugfixes [Limited to a number of people]
  • v1.1: Added random characters, spaceships, support for devices without WebGL [Unreleased]
  • v1.1.1: Added more parts, text changes, miscellaneous polish, new soundtrack for a good ending [First public release]
  • v1.1.2: Bug fixes, text changes, new effects, fixed abrupt difficulty spikes
